price: (Àwọn ni) àwọn tó ń sọ pé: “Olúwa wa, gbé ìyà iná Jahanamọ kúrò fún wa. Dájúdájú ìyà rẹ̀ jẹ́ ìyà àìnípẹ̀kun.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصۡرِفۡ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yaqūlūna rabbanā iṣ'rif ʿannā ʿadhāba jahannama inna ʿadhābahā kāna gharāman
